_comment: This is what Claude Code sends to nova-go trace via stdin

tool_output.stdout:
✓ Nova-c3n.8 · QA: Verify nova-go trace MVP implementation   [● P2 · CLOSED]

_processing_notes.what_nova_go_does: Reads this JSON from stdin, generates span_id UUID, maps event_type, writes to .claude/traces/
_processing_notes.what_mvp_excludes: Token counting, cost calculation, duration tracking, Beads task_id enrichment
_processing_notes.phase_2_will_add: Metrics (tokens, cost), Beads integration (task context), duration tracking
